titles.title: Nuclear Reactor Safety First Act
To limit the period in advance of a nuclear reactor license renewal that the application for such renewal may be submitted to the Nuclear Regulatory Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/21/2012--Introduced. Nuclear Reactor Safety First Act - Amends the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to prohibit the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) from approving the renewal of a nuclear reactor license if the renewal application was submitted more than 10 years before the license's expiration.
